item.description:
Tu'bav Party
THE JEWISH VALENTINES DAY

Tu B’av is the Jewish love holiday, so what better way to celebrate than with the biggest Jewish Party this summer! To celebrate in theme, get dressed in your best WHITE outfit and join us on the rooftop at the very chic new Splash Ultra lounge in Downtown Boston-think south beach. Love will be in the air, and drinks will be flowing…


~Live music

~Pinwheels Platters

~Cash Bar

Monday July 26th
7:30 PM
@ Splash Ultra Lounge
150 Kneeland Street
Boston

$15 prepay
$20 at the door

RSVP @ WWW.GETCHAI.COM/ROOFTOPPARTY
FACEBOOK EVENT http://www.facebook.c...

Co Sponsored L'chaim of Brookline
Host Committee
■Phillip King

item.name: MIDSUMMER NIGHT ROOFTOP PARTY
